title: Checkpoint Quantum Firewall - Firewall
description: - This dashboard gives insights about firewall related logs.

definition.content:
## Overview
- This dashboard gives insights about firewall related logs.

## Widgets
1. Total Events
2. Events Over Time
3. Events by Severity
4. Events by Connection Direction
5. Events by Action
6. Events by Protocol
7. Connections having Internal Source Zone
8. Connections having Internal Destination Zone
9. Connections having External Destination Zone
10. Connections having External Source Zone
11. Top Clients
12. Top Destinations
13. Clients by Inbound Bytes
14. Clients by Outbound Bytes
15. Destinations by Inbound Bytes
16. Destinations by Outbound Bytes
17. Clients by Inbound Packets
18. Clients by Outbound Packets
19. Destinations by Inbound Packets
20. Destinations by Outbound Packets
21. Log Details
